author: Gary Larson

entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for June 19, 2024

summary.caption: “According to these figures, Simmons, your department has lost another No. 2 Double N—and I want you to find it!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for June 19, 2024

summary.caption: Luposlipaphobia: The fear of being pursued by timber wolves around a kitchen table while wearing socks on a newly waxed floor.

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for June 19, 2024

summary.caption: “Never mind my name. You just tell your boss some thing is here to see him!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for June 19, 2024

summary.caption: “Looks like the bank’s been hit again. Well, no hurry—we’ll take the big horse.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 5 for June 19, 2024

summary.caption: “Well no wonder! … It’s plugged in! … And I thought I was going nuts!”
